name: Mirai High School Hack Club (A Visual Novel)
name_original: Mirai High School Hack Club (A Visual Novel)
description:
Mirai High School Hack Club - a place for the biggest computer geeks who are damn proud of it! This demo introduces the main characters (5 high school students from a Tokyo suburb) and sets up the basic scenario of the game where the user will have to make decisions whether to use (or not use) their superior hacking skills in situations where the ethical choice is not always clear.

This is my very first game attempt (for the Tyranobuilder Summer game jam in 2015) and I worked completely alone so I know things aren't super-polished :P I'm open to continuing this game if people like the concept there is enough interest :) Any constructive criticism is welcome!

If anyone would like to work on it with me, just shoot me a message!
